channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bloodsuckers
channel.desc: A student of Greek myth falls under a mysterious woman's spell. His friends search for him in Greece - can they find his enchantress? Peter Cushing stars. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hold Out A Hand
channel.desc: Hold out a Hand is a powerful short film talking about mental health and suicide within Gypsy and Travellers communities from real lived experience and in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Fareham to create a relaxing, productive garden for Lisa, Mike and their two boys, inspired by their travels - a space the whole family can enjoy.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is July and the team face their busiest month so far. Historian Ruth Goodman tries her hand at salmon netting, and there is a rare opportunity for a day away from the farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Chefs Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. In this episode, the chefs enter the 'Packed Lunch for Two' category in the Stokesley show.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Kate Bliss, Linda Lambert and Anthony Devine are in Monmouth.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard discovers the River Derwent's historical importance, as he journeys from the Derbyshire Peaks to Derby, the home of Rolls-Royce. Last in series.

channel.desc: Chefs Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. In this episode, the chefs enter the 'Packed Lunch for Two' category in the Stokesley show.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard discovers the River Derwent's historical importance, as he journeys from the Derbyshire Peaks to Derby, the home of Rolls-Royce. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Across the country, Alice explores what sex means for modern Brits: pleasure, money, something spiritual? Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Intimate Games
channel.desc: A psychology teacher instructs his university class to write down their sexual fantasies. The students then take their chance to make these desires a reality.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bloodsuckers
channel.desc: A student of Greek myth falls under a mysterious woman's spell. His friends search for him in Greece - can they find his enchantress? Peter Cushing stars. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bread
channel.desc: Seventies drama. Returning home from the Isle of Wight Pop Festival, a free-spirited group of guys and girls clash with the landowner where they pitch camp. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Following a painful adoption journey which comes to an abrupt halt, Hollyoaks star Ross Adams explores what can be done to make the system easier for LGBTQ+ adopters.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Reel Stories
channel.desc: Cinema projectionists make magic with light. As digital projection makes them obsolete, this film records the working lives of projectionists in the heyday of this dying art.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are in Bristol to come up with a design that suits Hannah and Dominic's opposing ideas for their garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: August brings the climax of the farming year, and the end of 12 months on the Edwardian Farm for the team. They must harvest their oat crop, but everything depends on the weather.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. The chefs both hope to win the day with their date and walnut scones at the Nidderdale show.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Caroline Hawley, Danny Sebastian and Stu Abbott head to Buxton.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. The chefs both hope to win the day with their date and walnut scones at the Nidderdale show.

channel.desc: August brings the climax of the farming year, and the end of 12 months on the Edwardian Farm for the team. They must harvest their oat crop, but everything depends on the weather.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are in Bristol to come up with a design that suits Hannah and Dominic's opposing ideas for their garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: D Day - Hour by Hour
channel.desc: On the 80th anniversary of D-Day, a turning point of World War II, extraordinary archive materials reveal contrasting stories from the Allied Normandy beach landings of 6 June 1944.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Let's Get Laid
channel.desc: Gordon Laid is a soldier returning to London after WW2. He gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identities. Bawdy romp with Robin Askwith. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Jack
channel.desc: Enjoyable romp set in the 18th century about a highwayman's adventures in the North of England. Ken Loach - taking a break from social realism - directs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Right To Roam
channel.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. In this episode they enter their roulades in the Otley Show, taking on the local experts.

channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. They go to London for the Lambeth Country Show and enter the Garden Vegetable Cake category.

channel.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. In this episode, the chefs head to Brighton for the Fiery Foods UK Chilli Festival.

channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard explores the wilds of Scotland as he journeys down the River Clyde, in search of clawed alien invertebrates and other elusive species, and learns about the impact the Clyde has had globally.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Buster
channel.desc: Comedy. The story of Great Train Robber Buster Edwards, a small-timer who fell in with more ambitious thieves. Phil Collins and Julie Walters star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Odd Job
channel.desc: Comedy. A despondent man hires a professional assassin to take himself out. Stars David Jason and Monty Python's Graham Chapman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruel Passion
channel.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Got It Made
channel.desc: Norfolk-set coming-of-age drama. Mere days before her wedding, an aristocratic girl discovers some hideous truths about the people closest to her. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Blood On Satan's Claw
channel.desc: In 18th-century England, a farmer finds a deformed skull, sparking a sinister influence over the village's youth, who fall under the grip of a demonic force. Folk horror classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tailored Stories
channel.desc: An oral history of Savile Row in London's Mayfair which has been the home of quality bespoke tailoring for over 200 years.

channel.title: New Home DIY

channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave Wellman who demonstrates how to create more space in a boxroom and make it into a into a proper bedroom. 2/10.

channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave Wellman is in Ramsgate restoring a period property - a masterclass in timber cladding is on. 3/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Join Dave Wellman in Shoreditch, who visits a couples run-down flat to help restore their fireplace to its former glory. 4/10.

channel.title: New Home DIY

channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave Wellman is in Romford tackling a bouncy wooden floor with wood worm and lays an oak floor. 6/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Water Babies
channel.desc: A young chimney sweep falsely accused of theft escapes into a river, entering a magical animated underwater world where he helps free captive Water Babies. A British classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. During World War II, a commando outfit disguised as an Italian Army unit is parachuted behind Axis lines. Lee Van Cleef stars.
